signUpMailTemplate.subject: [Techvisio] Please confirm your email address
signUpMailTemplate.body:
Hi,

{{ clientName }}

Thank you for choosing techvisio

click here to verify and activate your account.

Thanks,

The Techvisio Team

resetPasswordMailTemplate.subject: [Techvisio] New password generated
resetPasswordMailTemplate.body:
Hi,

{{ userName }}

You recently requested to reset your password for your techvisio account.

your new password provided below you can change it after login.

{{ password }}

Thanks,

The Techvisio Team
